original_text: And someone said to the man clothed in linen, who was above the waters of the stream, “How long shall it be till the end of these wonders?”
korean_text: 그 중에 하나가 세마포 옷을 입은 자 곧 강물 위쪽에 있는 자에게 이르되 이 놀라운 일의 끝이 어느 때까지냐 하더라

sentences.original_text: to the man clothed in linen
who was above the waters of the stream
“How long shall it be till the end of these wonders?”
